title: Villa Libera
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Italian-owned hostal and restaurant offering pizza, pasta, salad, house-made focaccia, and other Italian dishes. Several vegetarian choices but does use dairy and/or egg. Peaceful setting in a quiet field outside of Pedasi on the road to a local beach.
